# PackagedTools.GetToolPath method

Gets the path to the specified tool.

```csharp
public string GetToolPath(string package, string name = null)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| package | The package name and version, separated by a slash. |
| name | The tool name, if it differs from the package name. |

## Return Value

The path to the installed tool.
